tips:
Sign up for a reduced fare program and each Metro trip would only cost $1.

With reduced-fare capping you would never pay more than $3 a day or $10 a week. Every ride after would be FREE.

With regular-fare capping you would never pay more than $6 a day or $20 a week.

Sign up for a reduced fare program and each Metro trip would only cost $1.

With fare capping you would never pay more than $6 a day or $20 a week.

With reduced fare capping never pay more than $3 a day or $10 a week.

Once you hit daily and weekly cap, all rides on Metro buses and trains are free.
